title: Thunderbird runs only by typing it into Win-R.  Cannot find the exe file on my new Win 11 laptop
content:
Just installed Mozilla Thunderbird on my new Dell Win 11 laptop. I can only run it by typing it in the Win-R line. I cannot find any folders or executables on the laptop. Appreciate any help you can give me. Want to get this settled before I try to move my Win 10 Thunderbird Profile file over.

Thanks
creator: neraklrae

title: Thunderbird email account setup for Gmail will not accept my password for the account
content: I installed Thunderbird and set up my Outlook account with no problem. However, every time I try to add my Gmail account I get an error message "Unable to log in at server. Probably wrong configuration, username, or password." This happens whether I try to set up the account using either Thunderbird's automatic configuration by doing a manual configuration. Can anyone help? I can log into Gmail on the web with this email address and password with no problem.
creator: mjw72652

title: Thunderbird起動画面について
content: 起動画面の「寄付画面」を表示しないようにしたいのですが、設定のチェックを外しても相変わらず表示されてしまします。
creator: cquatre

title: Thunderbird email memory utilization
content: When I start Thunderbird email client, what is loaded into data memory? Is all of my email loaded into memory? Is the inbox for my login loaded into memory? I try to keep my inbox under 1000 emails. In all of the subfolders under the inbox I have a very large number of emails archived.
creator: glennmaillist

title: Schedule send for emails
content: As we need to send many for marketing in a day, but if we use Thunderbird, the emails will all be sent in a short time, which will cause our email address to be blocked by some users, so I wonder if we can schedule a time to send the messages. For example, messages can be sent at 3-minute interval. Does thunderbird have such a tool?
creator: elmercherryzhou
